## Description of Variables

  * `pid` - A unique id number for each playlist
  * `playlist_name` - A name given to each playlist
  * `pos` - The position of song in the playlist
  * `artist_name` - Name of the artist of the song
  * `track_name` - Name of the song
  * `duration_ms` - The length of the song in miliseconds
  * `album_name` - Name of album the song is in
